topPredictors.question: Have you ever:(select one per action) - heard of ‘Worn Wear’
Have you ever:(select one per action) - subscribed to the Patagonia online newsletter
Have you ever purchased a Patagonia product? - Response
Have you ever… (select one per option) - Participated in a demonstration about an environmental organisation/cause
Have you ever:(select one per action) - viewed Patagonia’s Facebook page
Have you ever:(select one per action) - visited the Patagonia website
Have you ever:(select one per action) - viewed Patagonia’s Instagram page
Have you ever:(select one per action) - watched a film made by Patagonia (such as Reef Beneath, 180 degrees South, Nevertown, Takanya)
Have you ever:(select one per action) - heard of ‘1% for the Planet’
In the last 12 months have you surfed (surfboard, bodyboard, SUP)? - Response

When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you right now in deciding which one to purchase?(select one per aspect) - includes Organic materials (eg. cotton grown without pesticides to minimise environmental impacts)

In the past 12 months have you purchased a surf clothing product from the following type of outlet: (select one per outlet types) - Single brand (sells only one brand) online store (eg. internet based site such Rip Curl, Billabong, Patagonia)
Please indicate your agreement with the following statements: (select one per statement) - I think that the brands in the surf industry currently have a strong focus on being sustainable
Have you ever… (select one per option) - Volunteered for an environmental organisation/cause

When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you right now in deciding which one to purchase?(select one per aspect) - includes Recycled materials (eg. polyester made from re-used plastic)
Have you ever purchased a Patagonia product from:(select one per outlet types) - A Patagonia retail shop

Please indicate how much you agree with the following statements:(select one response per statement) - I often tell family and friends about the benefits of purchasing environmentally friendly products

When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you right now in deciding which one to purchase?(select one per aspect) - includes Fairtrade materials (eg. cotton sourced from producers in developing countries and certified to provide enhanced workplace, social and environmental outcomes)

In the past 12 months have you purchased a surf clothing product from the following type of outlet: (select one per outlet types) - Multi brand (sells a variety of brands) online store (eg. internet based site such as surfstitch.com, sds.com.au)
Have you ever purchased a Patagonia product from:(select one per outlet types) - The Patagonia online store
